Experiences

Master student

2022 - present
Vrije University Amsterdam

I am a student in VUsec computer security program. I am doing research on microarchitecture security currently. I’m interested in lots of topics about security such as fuzzing, system security etc. VUsec courses are very hard, making people abnormal to some extends. I am lucky to pass the core courses: Binary Analysis and Malware, Software Security, Hardware Security.

Bacholar

2017 - 2021
Beijing Jiaotong University

In 2018, I started to use Linux on my laptop, and got interested in computer security. I was a member in IT center in 2019, worked as a operation and maintainance engineer. My campus is in Weihai, the city in Shandong. At first, I was a student in Accounting and Finance track, however, I changed my major to Computer Science in second year for some reasons. If you are interested in more stories in that time, I am so sorry to say: I don’t remember.
